typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cormorant+Garamond:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,600;1,400&family=Manrope:wght@300;400;500;700&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;0,700;1,400&display=swap');

usage.background: Use #FDFBF7 (Cream) as the main canvas. Avoid pure white.
usage.text: Use #2D2D2D (Charcoal) for headings, #5A5A5A for body. Never pure black.
usage.cta: Use #E0C097 (Rose Gold) for primary buttons. Hover state: #D4B088.
usage.subtle: Use #FCEDEF (Soft Pink) for highlights, badges, or active states.

grids.product_list: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-x-6 gap-y-12

layouts.mobile_nav: Fixed bottom navigation bar for app-like feel on mobile (Home, Search, Cart, Profile)

accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

media.treatment: Apply subtle warmth filter (sepia: 5%) to all images to match the cream palette.

hero.alt: Korean woman with flower jewelry portrait

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'colors' defined above. Override the default 'primary', 'secondary', 'background' to match the Cream/Rose Gold palette.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. MOBILE FIRST: Implement a 'Bottom Navigation Bar' component that only appears on mobile (hidden md:block). It should have icons for Home, Categories, Cart, Profile.
4. LAYOUT: The Home page must use the 'Tetris' grid for the 'Featured Collections' section. Do not just stack images.

5. PRODUCT CARD: Create a 'ProductCard' component. It should be minimal: Image (aspect 3/4), Title (Serif), Price (Sans), and a subtle 'Add to Cart' button that appears on hover (desktop) or always visible (mobile).
6. ADMIN DASHBOARD: Use the 'High Density' grid. Keep it clean but dense. Use the 'muted' color for the dashboard background to differentiate from the main store.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided image_urls. Do not use placeholders. Randomly assign the product images to the sample data.
8. ANIMATIONS: Add 'framer-motion' for page transitions. When clicking a product, the image should layout-id transition if possible, or at least fade in smoothly.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
